***
**Tender Notice # WS3835455751 - Window and Glass Repair**
==english "==français ""
### Tender Information

* **Tender Title**: Window and Glass Repair
* **Publication Date**: March 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 29, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (EDT)
* **Amendment Date**: March 21, 2023
* ***Procurement Method***: Competitive - Open bidding
* ***Selection Criteria***: Lowest price

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND), 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2 Canada
* **Contract Duration**: Effective March 31, 2023, to unspecified end date

### Notice Description

The Department of National Defence (Canada) and the Canadian Armed Forces is seeking a standing offer for window and glass repair services in Cold Lake.
The offer is open to all qualified bidders who can demonstrate they can meet the requirements of the tender. The proposed contract is for a standing offer that will be used by the Department of National Defence to meet their ongoing window and glass repair needs.

### Requirements

The winning bidder will be responsible for providing window and glass repair services to the Department of National Defence. This includes, but is not limited to, repairing damaged or broken windows, renovating existing windows, and installing new windows. The successful bidder will also be expected to provide detailed estimates, perform quality control checks, and meet all applicable quality and delivery commitments.

### Submission Requirements

Bids must be submitted via Ariba Discovery platform by March 29, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (EDT). Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

### Businesses Interested

Businesses interested in submitting a bid are requested to review the complete tender package on Ariba Discovery and shall confirm their ability to meet all of the requirements and specifications outlined in the bid package prior to submitting a bid.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Alibhay Premjee
* **Contact Email**: shan.alibhaypremjee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
